dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Puny mortal, your presence here is a mistake. What do you want?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to challenge your might.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hahaha, you crave destruction. I shall enjoy this battle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare yourself, beast!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you will regret crossing paths with me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravery will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield. Spare me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Spare you? Ha! Pathetic. Die.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense fear. Let us discuss a truce.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A truce? I do not trifle with weaklings like you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Weak? I offer strength in unity.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity with you? Absurd. I stand alone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, let us go our separate ways.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Leave this place before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge. Can you enlighten me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? You are not worthy of the wisdom I possess.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am open to learning. Teach me, mighty one.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You are a mere insect seeking knowledge. Begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, ignorant fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. Let us find common ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? There is no place for peace in these lands. Speak your purpose.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a truce for mutual benefit.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mutual benefit? What do you take me for, a fool?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Listen, I have a proposition that could benefit us both.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enough. Your words are meaningless. Prepare for battle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. If you seek conflict, then conflict it shall be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As it should be. Let the flames of war consume you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge and understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge... understanding... futile pursuits in the face of chaos.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Chaos may reign, but there is wisdom in seeking knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? You know nothing of true power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps you are right. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave, and do not return. The flames await you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can sense your power. Let us not waste it on unnecessary conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power wasted? Conflict fuels me. Speak your final words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. If you seek conflict, then conflict it shall be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An understanding at last. Let the battle commence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose to leave. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You retreat like a coward. Pathetic.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come to offer my allegiance. Together, we could be unstoppable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allegiance? To a weakling like you? The very thought is laughable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Strength can be found in unexpected places. Let us be allies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allies? I have no need for such alliances. Begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you cannot be reasoned with. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, insignificant one.
